name: Nepali Date Converter
description: This Nepali Date Converter application converts Nepali Date Bikram Sambat BS into English Date AD and English Date AD to Nepali Date Bikram Sambat. Simply, it is called as Nepali Date Converter. This application also works as Age Calculator. In addition, it shows current Date and Time in Nepal. Main feature of Nepali Date converter are:  1. It converts BS to AD date and converts AD to BS Date. (i.e. Nepali date to English Date and English date to Nepali date.) 2. It shows Nepali Date and Time. 3. It also calculates the age of a person. 4. It is very accurate. 5. It supports all the android mobile devices that exists i.e wide range of device support. 6. It consumes less space i.e less than a MB. 7. It is user-friendly.
